      (package private) Server Client.myServer
      Server reference, specifying which server in the simulation will be handling the service of this print task.

      Array of servers representing all of the printers in the simulation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Client.beginService(Server server, int time)
      Begins the service on this client by setting the server reference and the number of seconds it will take to finish serving.
